---
title: Preparing the Hydra Data
---

The hydra dataset is too large to include here, but this is how we prepared it. Original source from:

https://www.dropbox.com/scl/fo/034sm39vn8mzfglznvx5t/AP773_VCdEzl4HYxinE6i04?rlkey=5zj7sl843hor77gxr049epquh&e=1&dl=0

```{r}
library(zellkonverter)
library(Seurat)
library(SeuratObject)
set.seed(20250815)
data <- readRDS("data/Hydra.rds")
sampled_idx <- sample(seq_len(nrow(data)), 2000)
data[sampled_idx, ] |>
    as.SingleCellExperiment() |>
    writeH5AD("data/hydra.h5ad")
```
